name: cifti-separate
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Write a cifti structure as metric, label or volume.

For dtseries, dscalar, and dlabel, use COLUMN for <direction>, and if you have a symmetric dconn, COLUMN is more efficient.

You must specify at least one of -metric, -volume-all, -volume, or -label for this command to do anything.  Output volumes will spatially line up with their original positions, whether or not they are cropped.  Volume files produced by separating a dlabel file, or from the -label suboption of -volume-all, will be label volumes, see -volume-help.

For each <structure> argument, use one of the following strings:

CORTEX_LEFT
CORTEX_RIGHT
CEREBELLUM
ACCUMBENS_LEFT
ACCUMBENS_RIGHT
ALL_GREY_MATTER
ALL_WHITE_MATTER
AMYGDALA_LEFT
AMYGDALA_RIGHT
BRAIN_STEM
CAUDATE_LEFT
CAUDATE_RIGHT
CEREBELLAR_WHITE_MATTER_LEFT
CEREBELLAR_WHITE_MATTER_RIGHT
CEREBELLUM_LEFT
CEREBELLUM_RIGHT
CEREBRAL_WHITE_MATTER_LEFT
CEREBRAL_WHITE_MATTER_RIGHT
CORTEX
DIENCEPHALON_VENTRAL_LEFT
DIENCEPHALON_VENTRAL_RIGHT
HIPPOCAMPUS_LEFT
HIPPOCAMPUS_RIGHT
INVALID
OTHER
OTHER_GREY_MATTER
OTHER_WHITE_MATTER
PALLIDUM_LEFT
PALLIDUM_RIGHT
PUTAMEN_LEFT
PUTAMEN_RIGHT
THALAMUS_LEFT
THALAMUS_RIGHT

inputs.name: cifti_in
inputs.description: the cifti to separate a component of

inputs.name: direction
inputs.description: which direction to separate into components, ROW or COLUMN

inputs.name: volume_all
inputs.description: separate all volume structures into a volume file

type.name: volume_all
type.description: separate all volume structures into a volume file

inputs.name: volume_out
inputs.description: the output volume

inputs.name: opt_roi
inputs.description: also output the roi of which voxels have data

inputs.name: roi_out
inputs.description: the roi output volume

inputs.name: opt_label
inputs.description: output a volume label file indicating the location of structures

inputs.name: label_out
inputs.description: the label output volume

inputs.name: opt_crop
inputs.description: crop volume to the size of the data rather than using the original volume size

inputs.name: label
inputs.description: separate a surface model into a surface label file

type.name: label
type.description: separate a surface model into a surface label file

inputs.name: structure
inputs.description: the structure to output

inputs.name: label_out
inputs.description: the output label file

inputs.name: opt_roi
inputs.description: also output the roi of which vertices have data

inputs.name: roi_out
inputs.description: the roi output metric

inputs.name: metric
inputs.description: separate a surface model into a metric file

type.name: metric
type.description: separate a surface model into a metric file

inputs.name: structure
inputs.description: the structure to output

inputs.name: metric_out
inputs.description: the output metric

inputs.name: opt_roi
inputs.description: also output the roi of which vertices have data

inputs.name: roi_out
inputs.description: the roi output metric

inputs.name: volume
inputs.description: separate a volume structure into a volume file

type.name: volume
type.description: separate a volume structure into a volume file

inputs.name: structure
inputs.description: the structure to output

inputs.name: volume_out
inputs.description: the output volume

inputs.name: opt_roi
inputs.description: also output the roi of which voxels have data

inputs.name: roi_out
inputs.description: the roi output volume

inputs.name: opt_crop
inputs.description: crop volume to the size of the component rather than using the original volume size
